draw3

类 Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • draw3.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    class Client use to handle the drawing player's socket data
    作者:
    Kross

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void handle(int ox, int oy, int x, int y, java.awt.Color color, float size, java.lang.String words)
      The handle method is to get the current model and save in a temporary model and is to be sent to the guessing player
